channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison opposes Trump’s California military deployment in court
item.description:
Publication Date: June 12, 2025

Joins coalition of 22 states in amicus brief in support of California’s request to block Trump’s illegal federalization and deployment of National Guard

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/12_CaliforniaNationalGuard.asp

item.title: Attorney General Ellison issues updated consumer alert about 23andMe bankruptcy, data deletion
item.description:
Publication Date: June 12, 2025

Consumers have until July 14 to file claim in bankruptcy; deadline extended after AGs’ advocacy

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/12_23andMe.asp
